channel.title: DDC on Kyle Rassweiler's Portfolio

item.title: Daily Driver Challenge Hard(er) Mode Part 0
item.description: The Linus Tech Tips Daily Driver Challenge is an attempt at using a linux system as your main rig. The hard(er) mode version is using Arch and i3wm as the os of choice.
